basic_info.description: Hello, my name is KC Hofstetter and I am a software developer from Seattle, WA. Previously, I worked as a dental hygienist for 5 years before I made the switch to tech. The healthcare field provides their employees with some really important professional skills, including communication, teamwork, patience, emotional intelligence, and extremely detail oriented work. However, the dental world was a dead end for me professionally. My ideal career wouldnâ€™t allow me to become stagnant, so I chose to move into software development as a way to provide myself with more opportunities and to challenge myself daily. I would love to be a part of a team that focuses on collaboration and community, while producing products that help with user interaction with the web and accessibility.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: View the salmon cookies sales from all locations! Add a location to update the data.

projects.title: Bus Mall
projects.description: Help decide which products will be displayed in the Bus Mall catalog! You will be presented with three items at a time, simply choose which one you would most likely purchase. After a certain amount of votes, you can click the 'view results' button to see a bar graph of the results!
